I've heard of Tom Cruise's movie.  I was wondering if the Japanese themselves  
have made any movies about the Satsuma Rebellion?  It seems like such a  
natural subject for one of their movie makers to do a movie on.  In many  
ways, the Satsuma Rebellion parallels our Civil War.

Bob Burke
